name: Intel QAT Engine for OpenSSL software信息泄露漏洞
product: ["Intel Intel QAT Engine for OpenSSL software <1.6.1"]
description: Intel QAT Engine for OpenSSL software是一个开源软件插件，旨在通过Intel Quick Assist Technology（QAT）硬件加速OpenSSL的加密操作。Intel QAT Engine for OpenSSL software存在信息泄露漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-01177.html
patch: Intel QAT Engine for OpenSSL software信息泄露漏洞的补丁
